attributes.action: Change the law so dog owners face justice when their dog kills a pet cat.
attributes.additional_details:
As the law stands right now, I feel there is an imbalance of justice when someone's dog mauls another pet owner's cat.

I think this is an injustice to all cat owners.
attributes.background: I would like for the government to change the law so that cats have the same legal status as dogs and livestock when fatally injured by somebody else's dog.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it an offence for a person's dog to kill another pet and prosecute owners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729597
